name: Listened to Dear Internet Episode 42: Coffee Wife

content.html:
Dear Internet, On this week’s show we welcome a new wife the Dear Internet cinematic universe. Coffee wife. Coffee wife will bring you coffee whether you want it or not. This one…this one goes places. We also discuss the VR zone and what you should sacrifice to get the VR zone. And lastly we talk about salt grandpas. How do you deal with your salt grandpa? Let us know in the comments. Stay gold, XOXO We are a new show, and would greatly appreciate if you could leave us a 5-star review on your podcast app of choice! If you want more Dear Internet, please consider supporting us on patreon through Dear Internet. Sincerely, The coHosts- Nick Bristow, Jennifer Cheek, Michael DiMauro, and Tim Lanning! Apple Podcast, Spotify, RSS – follow us on Twitter!

By Dear Internet
